General.Name: Singaraja Putra
General.Description: PT Singaraja Putra Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the sale of processed wood merchandise in Indonesia. It is involved in trading business. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Bekasi, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jalan Galeria Singaraja Blok C No. 16-17, Bekasi, Indonesia, 17550
